name: Vectras-VM-Android
description: It's a Virtual Machine App for Android Which is Based on QEMU
readme_summary: Vectras VM is an Android application that emulates various operating systems using QEMU. It allows users to run operating systems like Windows, Linux, macOS, and Android on their Android devices. The application supports devices with Android 6.0 and up, with recommended specifications including Android 8.1, 8GB RAM, and a Snapdragon 855 CPU or better.
key_features: Emulates various OSes (Windows, Linux, macOS, Android)
Bootstraps for arm64 and x86_64 architectures
primary_use_case: Emulating different operating systems on Android devices.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled architect overseeing the construction of miniature worlds within a smartphone. The architect carefully places tiny buildings representing different operating systems (Windows, Linux, macOS, Android) onto a digital landscape inside the phone's screen. The phone emits a soft glow, illuminating the architect's focused expression. Small UI elements float around the scene, showing code snippets and system configurations. The repository name, 'Vectras VM,' is subtly etched onto the architect's blueprint. The scene is set in a brightly lit, futuristic workshop. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and sharp details.

name: BloodCat
description: A tool for collecting publicly exposed network cameras, with support for specifying country and region.
readme_summary: BloodCat is a Python tool designed to discover publicly exposed network cameras. It allows users to collect camera IPs, with the option to specify a country and region for targeted searches using the FoFa API.
key_features: Supports specifying country and region for targeted searches
Saves discovered results to a file
Includes a script to launch a viewer for the camera streams
primary_use_case: Collecting and accessing publicly exposed network camera streams for security research or monitoring purposes.
cover_image_prompt: A detective cat wearing a trench coat and fedora, peering through a pair of binoculars at a cityscape filled with glowing camera icons. The cat is perched on a rooftop overlooking a network of interconnected buildings, each subtly displaying a live camera feed. The detective cat is uncovering hidden cameras. Small UI elements showing IP addresses and location data float around the scene. The scene is set at night with a film noir aesthetic, using dark blues and grays with pops of neon green. The image should be in a digital painting style with sharp details and dramatic lighting.

name: falcraft
description: AI-powered texture remixing for Minecraft using fal
readme_summary: Falcraft is a Minecraft Fabric mod that allows users to generate 3D structures from text prompts and remix block textures using AI. It leverages fal.ai's Meshy v6 for 3D generation and nano-banana for texture editing, providing a seamless, in-game AI-powered creation experience.
key_features: Perceptual Color Matching using LAB color space
Dynamic Resource Packs for instant texture changes
primary_use_case: AI-powered 3D structure generation and texture remixing within Minecraft.
cover_image_prompt: A Minecraft player, represented as a customizable avatar, stands before a plain landscape, holding a magical paintbrush that emits glowing particles. With a single stroke, the paintbrush transforms the landscape, generating a majestic medieval castle from thin air. The castle's textures seamlessly blend with the surrounding environment. A small UI element displays the text prompt 'medieval castle' and a subtle falcraft logo is visible on the paintbrush. The scene is set in a vibrant Minecraft world with warm, inviting lighting. Small digital elements like code snippets and data visualizations float around the player. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: calcure
description: Modern TUI calendar and task manager with minimal and customizable UI.
readme_summary: Calcure is a modern, terminal-based calendar and task manager designed for efficient event and task management. It offers a customizable interface, Vim keybindings, and supports syncing with cloud calendars, importing from Calcurse, and displaying birthdays from abook.
key_features: View tasks and events from .ics files synced with clouds
Todo list with subtasks, deadlines, and timers
Import of events and tasks from calcurse
Customizable colors, icons, and other features
primary_use_case: Managing events and tasks in a terminal-based environment with a focus on efficiency and customization.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled clockmaker meticulously crafting a large, intricate clockwork calendar in their workshop. The calendar displays dates, tasks, and weather icons on its gears. The clockmaker uses Vim keys as tools to adjust the calendar's settings. Small screens display snippets of `.ics` data and cloud sync icons, subtly connecting the calendar to digital sources. The workshop is filled with light and has a focused composition. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and a warm color scheme.

name: swift-realtime-openai
description: A modern Swift SDK for OpenAI's Realtime API
readme_summary: This repository provides a modern Swift SDK for OpenAI's Realtime API, enabling developers to easily implement multi-modal conversations in their Swift applications. It handles microphone recording, assistant response playback, and offers a transparent layer for advanced API usage.
key_features: Simple interface for OpenAI's Realtime API
Transparent API layer for advanced use cases
primary_use_case: Implementing real-time, multi-modal conversations with OpenAI in Swift applications.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled conductor leading an orchestra where each instrument represents a different aspect of a real-time conversation (voice, text, AI response). The conductor's baton is a smartphone, subtly displaying the Swift code. Sound waves emanating from the orchestra transform into text bubbles and AI avatars, visualizing the flow of conversation. The stage is subtly decorated with OpenAI logos and digital particles. The scene is set in a modern concert hall with warm, inviting lighting. The composition is focused on the conductor and orchestra, with a clear and balanced layout. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and rich details.

name: rhythm
description: A modern Linux music player with stunning visualizations.
readme_summary: Rhythm is a modern Linux music player that offers both a graphical user interface (GUI) and a terminal user interface (TUI). It supports multiple audio formats, provides stunning visualizations, and is optimized for Linux systems, making it suitable for both desktop and server environments.
primary_use_case: Playing music on Linux systems with options for both GUI and terminal interfaces.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled conductor leading an orchestra where each instrument represents a different audio file. The conductor's baton controls the music, and vibrant sound waves emanate from the orchestra, visualized as colorful spectrums and waveforms. A small Linux penguin sits in the audience, enjoying the performance. Subtle UI elements float around the orchestra, displaying playlist controls and audio settings. The scene is set in a modern concert hall with dynamic lighting that responds to the music. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors, subtly incorporating the 'Rhythm' logo on the conductor's stand.

name: mixxx
description: Mixxx is Free DJ software that gives you everything you need to perform live mixes.
readme_summary: Mixxx is a free, open-source DJ software that provides all the necessary tools for live DJ mixes. It supports various operating systems, including GNU/Linux, Windows, and macOS, and offers features for both beginners and experienced DJs.
key_features: Build instructions for multiple operating systems
cover_image_prompt: A skilled DJ stands before a vibrant mixing console, seamlessly blending musical waveforms that visually materialize as flowing rivers merging into a powerful ocean. The console features glowing knobs and faders, subtly displaying UI elements from Mixxx. Digital particles emanate from the console, forming a dynamic sound visualization in the background. The scene is set in a modern, dimly lit club with a focused spotlight on the DJ. Small code snippets related to audio processing are subtly projected onto the walls. The composition is clean and focused, with a blue and purple color scheme. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: sshm
description: SSHM is a beautiful command-line tool that transforms how you manage and connect to your SSH hosts. Built with Go and featuring an intuitive TUI interface, it makes SSH connection management effortless and enjoyable.
readme_summary: SSHM is a command-line SSH manager written in Go that provides a TUI for managing and connecting to SSH hosts. It simplifies SSH connection management with features like port forwarding, tag support, smart search, and real-time status updates, aiming to make the process more efficient and user-friendly.
primary_use_case: Managing and connecting to SSH hosts via a terminal-based user interface.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled librarian in a grand, digital library is organizing glowing orbs representing SSH connections. The librarian uses a magical interface to tag, sort, and connect these orbs, creating pathways of light between them. Small UI elements float nearby, displaying connection details and status. The library is filled with subtle code patterns and data visualizations. The scene is set in a futuristic library with soft, ambient lighting. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.
